projects.title: Predictive Analysis of NFL Running Backs
projects.description: Conducted a predictive analysis of NFL running backsâ€™ performance using historical data, focusing on key metrics. Developed and deployed machine learning models, including Random Forest and Gradient Boosting, achieving 15% higher prediction accuracy.

projects.title: Claims Management System
projects.description: Designed and developed a full-stack claims management system to streamline healthcare workflows. Built a secure backend using .NET Core and SQL Server, with a responsive Angular frontend. Deployed on GCP.
projects.technologies: .NET Core, SQL Server, Angular, GCP, RESTful APIs, Git

projects.title: Big Data Analytics Project
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Big Data processing solution using Apache Cassandra to manage and query large volumes of distributed data efficiently. Focused on scalability and high availability.
projects.technologies: Apache Cassandra, NoSQL, Data Modeling, Tableau, Python

projects.title: RFM Model based clustering analysis
projects.description: Applied the RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) model to segment customers into meaningful clusters using K-Means clustering, leading to 20% improved marketing personalization and customer retention.
projects.technologies: Python, Pandas, Altair AI, RapidMiner, Tableau

projects.title: Cloud-Based Data Warehouse using Snowflake
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable cloud-based data warehouse solution for a healthcare client using Snowflake. Automated ETL pipelines using Azure Data Factory.
projects.technologies: Snowflake, SQL, AWS, Python, Tableau, ETL tools

projects.title: Symptom Analysis for Monkeypox Diagnosis
projects.description: Analyzed patient health data to identify key symptoms of monkeypox outbreaks. Applied machine learning models to improve diagnostic accuracy by 25%.
projects.technologies: Python, RapidMiner, Tableau, Decision Trees, Logistic Regression
